DESCRIPTION: #yId cards are automatically played when drawn regardless of Energy.
Whenever an enemy dies, heal HP equal to its #yTerror.
Whenever a mind controlled enemy deals damage or applies a debuff, a random enemy receives it instead. Whenever it applies a buff, gains Block, or heals HP, you receive it instead.
A relic that allows you to view your draw pile in order.
A 1 cost Skill that doubles(triples) target enemy's #yTerror then exhausts.
#yStunned enemies do nothing on their turn.
#yConstricted enemies take damage at the end of their turn.
